title: mri_extract_label

input_volume.description: Input volume from which to extract labels.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Labels to extract. Can include one or more labels.

gaussian_smoothing.title: Gaussian Smoothing
gaussian_smoothing.description: Apply a Gaussian smoothing kernel with sigma.

transform_file.title: Transform File

exit_none_found.description: Exit with error if none of the specified labels are found.

dilate.title: Dilate
dilate.description: Dilate the output volume n times.

erode.title: Erode
